page.title: 09BUTLER AND OLIVER GARAGE
page.content: This was at one time known as the Station Garage because it was opposite the Station.The garage is now owned and run by Bill Butler who has worked in the Garage since 1951 when he left school. There are four mechanics with George Butler in charge of stores.Bill's wife,Jeanie,does the administration,and Bill sells cars-he has the franchise for Austin-Rover Until now,petrol has been served to customers,but inAugust it is hoped to instal new self-service pumps.Recently a warm wash and high-pressure spray was installed. Bill is a real character.He has a rough and ready appearance,but he is full of fun and stories.Every year at the Jed. Festival procession he enters a "vehicle" of some description.There is a 24-hour breakdown service.
